translations.text: Thereafter he shall be recompensed therefor with the fullest recompense.

translations.name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
translations.text: Then he will be recompensed with a full and the best recompense.

translations.name: Talal Itani
translations.text: Then he will be rewarded for it the fullest reward.

translations.name: Abul Ala Maududi
translations.text: and that he shall then be fully recompensed,

translations.name: Safi-ur-Rahman al-Mubarakpuri
translations.text: Then he will be recompensed with a full and the best recompense.

translations.name: Mohammed Marmaduke William Pickthall
translations.text: And afterward he will be repaid for it with fullest payment;

translations.name: Ali Quli Qarai
translations.text: then he will be rewarded for it with the fullest reward;

translations.name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
translations.text: then, he shall be recompensed for it in full repayment

translations.name: Saheeh International
translations.text: Then he will be recompensed for it with the fullest recompense

translations.name: Muhammad Sarwar
translations.text: and will be fully recompensed for his deeds.

translations.name: Mohammad Habib Shakir
translations.text: Then shall he be rewarded for it with the fullest reward-

translations.name: English Transliteration
translations.text: Thumma yujz<u>a</u>hu aljaz<u>a</u>a alawf<u>a</u>

translations.name: Wahiduddin Khan
translations.text: and in the end he will be repaid for it in full;

translations.name: Abdullah Yusuf Ali
translations.text: Then will he be rewarded with a reward complete;

translations.name: Hussain Ansarian
translations.text: و اینکه پایان [همه امور] به سوی پروردگارتوست؛

translations.name: AbdolMohammad Ayati
translations.text: و پايان راه همه، پروردگار توست.

translations.name: Abolfazl Bahrampour
translations.text: و اين كه پايان [كار] به سوى پروردگار توست

translations.name: Mohammad Mahdi Fooladvand
translations.text: و اينكه پايان [كار] به سوى پروردگار توست.

translations.name: Mahdi Elahi Ghomshei
translations.text: و اینکه کار خلق عالم به سوی خدا منتهی می‌شود.

translations.name: Mostafa Khorramdel
translations.text: و این که قطعاً پایان راه به پروردگار تو منتهی می‌شود (و بازگشت همگان در پایان جهان بدو است). [[«الْمُنتَهی»: نهایت کار. مرجع. بازگشت (نگا: غافر / 3، علق / 8).]]

translations.name: Baha'oddin Khorramshahi
translations.text: و اینکه سرانجام [همه کار و همه چیز] با پروردگار توست‌

translations.name: Naser Makarem Shirazi
translations.text: (و آیا از کتب پیشین انبیا به او نرسیده است) که همه امور به پروردگارت منتهی می‌گردد؟!

translations.name: Mohammad Kazem Moezzi
translations.text: و آنکه بسوی پروردگار تو است پایان‌

translations.name: Sayyed Jalaloddin Mojtabavi
translations.text: و پايان و بازگشت [همگان‌] به سوى پروردگار توست.

translations.name: Mohammad Sadeqi Tehrani
translations.text: و اینکه به‌راستی فرجام (کار) سوی پروردگار تو است.

translations.name: Ahmed Ali
translations.text: And that to your Lord is your returning;

translations.name: Ahmed Raza Khan
translations.text: And that the end is only towards your Lord?

translations.name: A. J. Arberry
translations.text: and that the final end is unto thy Lord,

translations.name: Abdul Majid Daryabadi
translations.text: And that Unto thy Lord is the goal.

translations.name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
translations.text: And that to your Lord (Allah) is the End (Return of everything).

translations.name: Talal Itani
translations.text: And that to your Lord is the finality.

translations.name: Abul Ala Maududi
translations.text: and that the final end is with your Lord,

translations.name: Safi-ur-Rahman al-Mubarakpuri
translations.text: And that to your Lord is the End.

translations.name: Mohammed Marmaduke William Pickthall
translations.text: And that thy Lord, He is the goal;

translations.name: Ali Quli Qarai
translations.text: that the terminus is toward your Lord,

translations.name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
translations.text: and that the final return is to your Lord,

translations.name: Saheeh International
translations.text: And that to your Lord is the finality

translations.name: Muhammad Sarwar
translations.text: To your Lord will all things eventually return.

translations.name: Mohammad Habib Shakir
translations.text: And that to your Lord is the goal-

translations.name: English Transliteration
translations.text: Waanna il<u>a</u> rabbika almuntah<u>a</u>

translations.name: Wahiduddin Khan
translations.text: that all things in the end shall return to God;

translations.name: Abdullah Yusuf Ali
translations.text: That to thy Lord is the final Goal;

verses.text: وَ أَنَّهُ‌ هُوَ أَضْحَکَ‌ وَ أَبْکَى‌

translations.name: Hussain Ansarian
translations.text: و این اوست که می خنداند و می گریاند؛

translations.name: AbdolMohammad Ayati
translations.text: و اوست كه مى‌خنداند و مى‌گرياند.

translations.name: Abolfazl Bahrampour
translations.text: و هم اوست كه بخنداند و بگرياند

translations.name: Mohammad Mahdi Fooladvand
translations.text: و هم اوست كه مى‌خنداند و مى‌گرياند.

translations.name: Mahdi Elahi Ghomshei
translations.text: و هم اوست که (بندگان را) شاد و خندان سازد و غمین و گریان گرداند.

translations.name: Mostafa Khorramdel
translations.text: و این که قطعاً او است که می‌خنداند و می‌گریاند. [[«أَضْحَکَ وَ أَبْکی»: خنداند و گریاند. یعنی اسباب خنده و گریه را فراهم می‌کند.]]

translations.name: Baha'oddin Khorramshahi
translations.text: و اوست که می‌خنداند و می‌گریاند

translations.name: Naser Makarem Shirazi
translations.text: و اینکه اوست که خنداند و گریاند،

translations.name: Mohammad Kazem Moezzi
translations.text: و آنکه او است که بخندانید و بگریانید

translations.name: Sayyed Jalaloddin Mojtabavi
translations.text: و اوست كه بخنداند و بگرياند.

translations.name: Mohammad Sadeqi Tehrani
translations.text: و اینکه به‌راستی اوست که خنداند و گریاند.

translations.name: Ahmed Ali
translations.text: That it is He who makes you happy and morose,

translations.name: Ahmed Raza Khan
translations.text: And that it is He Who made (you) laugh and made (you) cry?

translations.name: A. J. Arberry
translations.text: and that it is He who makes to laugh, and that makes to weep,

translations.name: Abdul Majid Daryabadi
translations.text: And that it is He Who causeth to laugh and causeth to weep.

translations.name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
translations.text: And that it is He (Allah) Who makes (whom He wills) laugh, and makes (whom He wills) weep;

translations.name: Talal Itani
translations.text: And that it is He who causes laughter and weeping.

translations.name: Abul Ala Maududi
translations.text: and that He it is Who causes people to laugh and to cry,

translations.name: Safi-ur-Rahman al-Mubarakpuri
translations.text: And that it is He Who makes laugh, and makes weep.

translations.name: Mohammed Marmaduke William Pickthall
translations.text: And that He it is who maketh laugh, and maketh weep,

translations.name: Ali Quli Qarai
translations.text: that it is He who makes [men] laugh, and weep,

translations.name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
translations.text: that it is He who causes to laugh and causes to weep.

translations.name: Saheeh International
translations.text: And that it is He who makes [one] laugh and weep

translations.name: Muhammad Sarwar
translations.text: It is He who causes laughter and weeping.

translations.name: Mohammad Habib Shakir
translations.text: And that He it is Who makes (men) laugh and makes (them) weep;

translations.name: English Transliteration
translations.text: Waannahu huwa a<u>dh</u>aka waabk<u>a</u>

translations.name: Wahiduddin Khan
translations.text: that it is He who brings laughter and tears;

translations.name: Abdullah Yusuf Ali
translations.text: That it is He Who granteth Laughter and Tears;

verses.text: وَ أَنَّهُ‌ هُوَ أَمَاتَ‌ وَ أَحْيَا

translations.name: Hussain Ansarian
translations.text: و هم اوست که می میراند و زنده می کند.

translations.name: AbdolMohammad Ayati
translations.text: و اوست كه مى‌ميراند و زنده مى‌كند.

translations.name: Abolfazl Bahrampour
translations.text: و هم اوست كه ميراند و زنده كرد

translations.name: Mohammad Mahdi Fooladvand
translations.text: و هم اوست كه مى‌ميراند و زنده مى‌گرداند.

translations.name: Mahdi Elahi Ghomshei
translations.text: و هم اوست که بمیراند و باز زنده فرماید.

translations.name: Mostafa Khorramdel
translations.text: و این که قطعاً او است که می‌میراند و زنده می‌گرداند. [[«أَمَاتَ وَ أَحْیَا»: (نگا: بقره / 258، حجر / 23، ق / 43).]]

translations.name: Baha'oddin Khorramshahi
translations.text: و اوست که می‌میراند و زنده می‌دارد

translations.name: Naser Makarem Shirazi
translations.text: و اوست که میراند و زنده کرد،

translations.name: Mohammad Kazem Moezzi
translations.text: و آنکه او است که میرانید و زنده ساخت‌

translations.name: Sayyed Jalaloddin Mojtabavi
translations.text: و اوست كه بميراند و زنده كند.

translations.name: Mohammad Sadeqi Tehrani
translations.text: و اینکه به‌راستی (هم)او میرانْد و زنده کرد.

translations.name: Ahmed Ali
translations.text: And He who ordains death and life;

translations.name: Ahmed Raza Khan
translations.text: And that it is He Who gave death and gave life?

translations.name: A. J. Arberry
translations.text: and that it is He who makes to die, and that makes to live,

translations.name: Abdul Majid Daryabadi
translations.text: And that it is He Who causeth to die and causeth to live.

translations.name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
translations.text: And that it is He (Allah) Who causes death and gives life;

translations.name: Talal Itani
translations.text: And that it is He who gives death and life.

translations.name: Abul Ala Maududi
translations.text: and that He it is Who causes death and grants life,

translations.name: Safi-ur-Rahman al-Mubarakpuri
translations.text: And that it is He Who causes death and gives life.

translations.name: Mohammed Marmaduke William Pickthall
translations.text: And that He it is Who giveth death and giveth life;

translations.name: Ali Quli Qarai
translations.text: that it is He who brings death and gives life,

translations.name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
translations.text: and that it is He who causes to die, and causes to live

translations.name: Saheeh International
translations.text: And that it is He who causes death and gives life

translations.name: Muhammad Sarwar
translations.text: It is He who causes death and gives life.

translations.name: Mohammad Habib Shakir
translations.text: And that He it is Who causes death and gives life-

translations.name: English Transliteration
translations.text: Waannahu huwa am<u>a</u>ta waa<u>h</u>y<u>a</u>

translations.name: Wahiduddin Khan
translations.text: that it is He who causes death and gives life;

translations.name: Abdullah Yusuf Ali
translations.text: That it is He Who granteth Death and Life;

verses.text: وَ أَنَّهُ‌ خَلَقَ‌ الزَّوْجَيْنِ‌ الذَّکَرَ وَ الْأُنْثَى‌

translations.name: Hussain Ansarian
translations.text: واوست که دو زوج نر وماده آفرید،

translations.name: AbdolMohammad Ayati
translations.text: و اوست كه جفتهاى نر و ماده را آفريده است،

translations.name: Abolfazl Bahrampour
translations.text: و اوست كه دو زوج نر و ماده را آفريد

translations.name: Mohammad Mahdi Fooladvand
translations.text: و هم اوست كه دو نوع مى‌آفريند: نر و ماده،

translations.name: Mahdi Elahi Ghomshei
translations.text: و اوست که خلق را (برای انس با هم) جفت نر و ماده آفریده است.

translations.name: Mostafa Khorramdel
translations.text: و این که او است که جفتهای نر و ماده را می‌آفریند. [[«الذَّکَرَ»: بدل (الزَّوْجَیْنِ) است.]]

translations.name: Baha'oddin Khorramshahi
translations.text: و اوست که زوج نرینه و مادینه را آفرید

translations.name: Naser Makarem Shirazi
translations.text: و اوست که دو زوج نر و مادّه را آفرید...

translations.name: Mohammad Kazem Moezzi
translations.text: و آنکه او آفرید دو جفت را نر و ماده‌

translations.name: Sayyed Jalaloddin Mojtabavi
translations.text: و اوست كه دو گونه: نر و ماده بيافريد،

translations.name: Mohammad Sadeqi Tehrani
translations.text: و هم اوست که به درستی دو نوع آفرید: نر و ماده.

translations.name: Ahmed Ali
translations.text: That He created pairs, male and female,

translations.name: Ahmed Raza Khan
translations.text: And that it is He Who has created the two pairs, male and female?

translations.name: A. J. Arberry
translations.text: and that He Himself created the two kinds, male and female,

translations.name: Abdul Majid Daryabadi
translations.text: And that He createth the pair, the male and the female.

translations.name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
translations.text: And that He (Allah) creates the pairs, male and female,

translations.name: Talal Itani
translations.text: And that it is He who created the two kinds—the male and the female.

translations.name: Abul Ala Maududi
translations.text: and He it is Who created the two kinds, the male and the female,

translations.name: Safi-ur-Rahman al-Mubarakpuri
translations.text: And that He creates the pairs, male and female,

translations.name: Mohammed Marmaduke William Pickthall
translations.text: And that He createth the two spouses, the male and the female,

translations.name: Ali Quli Qarai
translations.text: that it is He who created the mates, the male and the female,

translations.name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
translations.text: and that it is He who created pairs, the male and the female,

translations.name: Saheeh International
translations.text: And that He creates the two mates - the male and female -

translations.name: Muhammad Sarwar
translations.text: It is He who has created spouses, male and female,

translations.name: Mohammad Habib Shakir
translations.text: And that He created pairs, the male and the female

translations.name: English Transliteration
translations.text: Waannahu khalaqa alzzawjayni alththakara waalontha

translations.name: Wahiduddin Khan
translations.text: and that He Himself created the two sexes: male and female,

translations.name: Abdullah Yusuf Ali
translations.text: That He did create in pairs,- male and female,

translations.name: Hussain Ansarian
translations.text: از نطفه هنگامی که در رحم ریخته شود.

translations.name: AbdolMohammad Ayati
translations.text: از نطفه، آنگاه كه در رحم ريخته مى‌شود.

translations.name: Abolfazl Bahrampour
translations.text: از نطفه‌اى آن‌گاه كه ريخته شود

translations.name: Mohammad Mahdi Fooladvand
translations.text: از نطفه‌اى چون فرو ريخته شود.

translations.name: Mahdi Elahi Ghomshei
translations.text: از نطفه‌ای آفریده که (از مردان به رحم زنان) می‌ریزد.

translations.name: Mostafa Khorramdel
translations.text: از نطفه‌ی ناچیزی، بدانگاه که (به رحم) جهانده می‌شود. [[«تُمْنی»: پرانده و جهانده می‌گردد (نگا: طارق / 6).]]

translations.name: Baha'oddin Khorramshahi
translations.text: از نطفه‌ای که [در رحم‌] فرو می‌ریزد

translations.name: Naser Makarem Shirazi
translations.text: از نطفه‌ای هنگامی که خارج می‌شود (و در رحم می‌ریزد)،

translations.name: Mohammad Kazem Moezzi
translations.text: از چکّه آبی گاهی که ریخته گردد

translations.name: Sayyed Jalaloddin Mojtabavi
translations.text: از نطفه‌اى، آنگاه كه در رحم ريخته شود.

translations.name: Mohammad Sadeqi Tehrani
translations.text: از نطفه‌ای آن هنگام که (ضمن منی) می‌جهد.

translations.name: Ahmed Ali
translations.text: From a drop of semen when emitted;

translations.name: Ahmed Raza Khan
translations.text: From a drop of liquid, when it is added?

translations.name: A. J. Arberry
translations.text: of a sperm-drop, when it was cast forth,

translations.name: Abdul Majid Daryabadi
translations.text: From seed when it is emitted.

translations.name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
translations.text: From Nutfah (drops of semen male and female discharges) when it is emitted;

translations.name: Talal Itani
translations.text: From a sperm drop, when emitted.

translations.name: Abul Ala Maududi
translations.text: from a drop of sperm when it was emitted,

translations.name: Safi-ur-Rahman al-Mubarakpuri
translations.text: From Nutfah when it is emitted.

translations.name: Mohammed Marmaduke William Pickthall
translations.text: From a drop (of seed) when it is poured forth;

translations.name: Ali Quli Qarai
translations.text: from a drop of [seminal] fluid when emitted;

translations.name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
translations.text: from an ejaculated drop (of sperm),

translations.name: Saheeh International
translations.text: From a sperm-drop when it is emitted

translations.name: Muhammad Sarwar
translations.text: from a discharged living germ

translations.name: Mohammad Habib Shakir
translations.text: From the small seed when it is adapted

translations.name: English Transliteration
translations.text: Min nu<u>t</u>fatin i<u>tha</u> tumn<u>a</u>

translations.name: Wahiduddin Khan
translations.text: from an ejected drop of sperm;

translations.name: Abdullah Yusuf Ali
translations.text: From a seed when lodged (in its place);

translations.name: Hussain Ansarian
translations.text: و پدید آوردن جهان دیگر بر عهده اوست،

translations.name: AbdolMohammad Ayati
translations.text: و بر خداوند است كه آن را بار ديگر زنده كند.

translations.name: Abolfazl Bahrampour
translations.text: و اين كه ايجاد عالم ديگر (رستاخيز) بر عهده‌ى اوست

translations.name: Mohammad Mahdi Fooladvand
translations.text: و هم پديد آوردن [عالم‌] ديگر بر [عهده‌] اوست.

translations.name: Mahdi Elahi Ghomshei
translations.text: و هم بر اوست که ایجاد نشأه آخرت کند.

translations.name: Mostafa Khorramdel
translations.text: و این که قطعاً بر خدا است که (رستاخیز را پدیدار و مردگان را) زندگی دوباره بخشد. [[«النَّشْأَةَ الأُخْری»: پیدایش دیگر. مراد رستاخیز مردگان و حیات دوباره است.]]

translations.name: Baha'oddin Khorramshahi
translations.text: و اینکه پدید آوردن نشاه آخرت با اوست‌

translations.name: Naser Makarem Shirazi
translations.text: و اینکه بر خداست ایجاد عالم دیگر (تا عدالت اجرا گردد)،

translations.name: Mohammad Kazem Moezzi
translations.text: و آنکه بر او است پدیدآوردن دیگر

translations.name: Sayyed Jalaloddin Mojtabavi
translations.text: و بر اوست آفرينش ديگر- آفرينش نو هنگام رستاخيز-.

translations.name: Mohammad Sadeqi Tehrani
translations.text: و هم پدید آوردن (عالم) دیگر به‌راستی تنها بر (عهده‌ی) اوست.

translations.name: Ahmed Ali
translations.text: That the second creation is incumbent on Him;

translations.name: Ahmed Raza Khan
translations.text: And that only upon Him is the next revival?

translations.name: A. J. Arberry
translations.text: and that upon Him rests the second growth,

translations.name: Abdul Majid Daryabadi
translations.text: And that upon Him is another bringing forth.

translations.name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
translations.text: And that upon Him (Allah) is another bringing forth (Resurrection);

translations.name: Talal Itani
translations.text: And that upon Him is the next existence.

translations.name: Abul Ala Maududi
translations.text: and that it is for Him to grant the second life,

translations.name: Safi-ur-Rahman al-Mubarakpuri
translations.text: And that upon Him is another bringing forth (Resurrection).

translations.name: Mohammed Marmaduke William Pickthall
translations.text: And that He hath ordained the second bringing forth;

translations.name: Ali Quli Qarai
translations.text: that with Him lies the second genesis,

translations.name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
translations.text: and that upon Him is the second creation

translations.name: Saheeh International
translations.text: And that [incumbent] upon Him is the next creation

translations.name: Muhammad Sarwar
translations.text: and on Him depends the life hereafter.

translations.name: Mohammad Habib Shakir
translations.text: And that on Him is the bringing forth a second time;

translations.name: English Transliteration
translations.text: Waanna AAalayhi alnnashata alokhra

translations.name: Wahiduddin Khan
translations.text: and that He will bring about the Second Creation;

translations.name: Abdullah Yusuf Ali
translations.text: That He hath promised a Second Creation (Raising of the Dead);

verses.text: وَ أَنَّهُ‌ هُوَ أَغْنَى‌ وَ أَقْنَى‌

translations.name: Hussain Ansarian
translations.text: و اوست که شما را توانگر کرد و سرمایه قابل ذخیره بخشید،

translations.name: AbdolMohammad Ayati
translations.text: و اوست كه بى‌نياز كند و روزى دهد.

translations.name: Abolfazl Bahrampour
translations.text: و هم اوست كه [شما را] بى‌نياز كرد و مال بخشيد

translations.name: Mohammad Mahdi Fooladvand
translations.text: و هم اوست كه [شما را] بى‌نياز كرد و سرمايه بخشيد.

translations.name: Mahdi Elahi Ghomshei
translations.text: و هم اوست که (بندگان را) بی‌نیاز کند و سرمایه (هر سعادت) بخشد.

translations.name: Mostafa Khorramdel
translations.text: و این که او است که قطعاً ثروتمند می‌کند و فقیر می‌گرداند. [[«أَغْنی»: دارائی داد و ثروتمند گرداند. «أَقْنی»: همزه این واژه برای سلب است و به معنی (فقیر کرد) می‌باشد (نگا: آلوسی). به دلیل تقابل. أَضْحَکَ وَ أَبْکی ... أَماتَ وَ أَحْیَا. برخی هم آن را به معنی (توشه داد و ارضاء کرد) گرفته‌اند.]]

translations.name: Baha'oddin Khorramshahi
translations.text: و اوست که بی‌نیاز کند و سرمایه دهد

translations.name: Naser Makarem Shirazi
translations.text: و اینکه اوست که بی‌نیاز کرد و سرمایه باقی بخشید،

translations.name: Mohammad Kazem Moezzi
translations.text: و آنکه او بی‌نیاز کرد و نگاه داشت‌

translations.name: Sayyed Jalaloddin Mojtabavi
translations.text: و اوست كه توانگرى دهد و مال بخشد- يا خرسندى و خشنودى دهد-.

translations.name: Mohammad Sadeqi Tehrani
translations.text: و هم اوست که (شما را) بی‌نیاز کرد و کفایت بخشید.

translations.name: Ahmed Ali
translations.text: That it is He who makes you rich and contented;

translations.name: Ahmed Raza Khan
translations.text: And that it is He Who has given wealth and contentment?

translations.name: A. J. Arberry
translations.text: and that it is He who gives wealth and riches,

translations.name: Abdul Majid Daryabadi
translations.text: And that it is He Who enricheth and preserveth property.

translations.name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
translations.text: And that it is He (Allah) Who gives much or a little (or gives wealth and contentment),

translations.name: Talal Itani
translations.text: And that it is He who enriches and impoverishes.

translations.name: Abul Ala Maududi
translations.text: that He it is Who bestowed wealth and riches,

translations.name: Safi-ur-Rahman al-Mubarakpuri
translations.text: And that it is He Who Aghna and Aqna.

translations.name: Mohammed Marmaduke William Pickthall
translations.text: And that He it is Who enricheth and contenteth;

translations.name: Ali Quli Qarai
translations.text: that it is He who enriches and grants possessions,

translations.name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
translations.text: and that it is He who gives riches and causes to hoard,

translations.name: Saheeh International
translations.text: And that it is He who enriches and suffices

translations.name: Muhammad Sarwar
translations.text: It is He who grants people temporary and durable wealth.

translations.name: Mohammad Habib Shakir
translations.text: And that He it is Who enriches and gives to hold;

translations.name: English Transliteration
translations.text: Waannahu huwa aghn<u>a</u> waaqn<u>a</u>

translations.name: Wahiduddin Khan
translations.text: that it is He who gives wealth and possessions;

translations.name: Abdullah Yusuf Ali
translations.text: That it is He Who giveth wealth and satisfaction;

translations.name: Hussain Ansarian
translations.text: و او پروردگار [ستاره] شِعری است،

translations.name: AbdolMohammad Ayati
translations.text: و اوست پرردگار ستاره شِعرى.

translations.name: Abolfazl Bahrampour
translations.text: و هم اوست پروردگار ستاره‌ى شعرى (كه او را مى‌پرستيدند)

translations.name: Mohammad Mahdi Fooladvand
translations.text: و هم اوست پروردگار ستاره «شِعرى».

translations.name: Mahdi Elahi Ghomshei
translations.text: و هم اوست آفریننده ستاره شعری (پس آفریننده را پرستید نه ستاره را).

translations.name: Mostafa Khorramdel
translations.text: و این که او است خداوندگار ستاره شِعری. [[«الشِّعْری»: نام ستاره‌ای است که گروهی از مشرکان عرب آن را می‌پرستیدند. قرآن می‌فرماید: چرا شعری را می‌پرستید، آفریدگار آن را بپرستید.]]

translations.name: Baha'oddin Khorramshahi
translations.text: و اوست که پروردگار شعری است‌

translations.name: Naser Makarem Shirazi
translations.text: و اینکه اوست پروردگار ستاره «شعرا»!

translations.name: Mohammad Kazem Moezzi
translations.text: و آنکه او است پروردگار شعری (ستاره است)

translations.name: Sayyed Jalaloddin Mojtabavi
translations.text: و اوست خداوند شعرى.

translations.name: Mohammad Sadeqi Tehrani
translations.text: و هم اوست که پروردگار (ستاره‌ی) «شعری‌» است.

translations.name: Ahmed Ali
translations.text: That He is the Lord of Sirius;

translations.name: Ahmed Raza Khan
translations.text: And that He only is the Lord of the star Sirius?

translations.name: A. J. Arberry
translations.text: and that it is He who is the Lord of Sirius,

translations.name: Abdul Majid Daryabadi
translations.text: And that it is He Who is the Lord of Sirius.

translations.name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
translations.text: And that He (Allah) is the Lord of Sirius (the star which the pagan Arabs used to worship);

translations.name: Talal Itani
translations.text: And that it is He who is the Lord of Sirius.

translations.name: Abul Ala Maududi
translations.text: that He is the Lord of Sirius,

translations.name: Safi-ur-Rahman al-Mubarakpuri
translations.text: And that He is the Lord of Ash-Shi`ra.

translations.name: Mohammed Marmaduke William Pickthall
translations.text: And that He it is Who is the Lord of Sirius;

translations.name: Ali Quli Qarai
translations.text: that it is He who is the Lord of Sirius;

translations.name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
translations.text: and that He is the Lord of (the star) Sirius,

translations.name: Saheeh International
translations.text: And that it is He who is the Lord of Sirius

translations.name: Muhammad Sarwar
translations.text: It is He who is the Lord of Sirius.

translations.name: Mohammad Habib Shakir
translations.text: And that He is the Lord of the Sirius;

translations.name: English Transliteration
translations.text: Waannahu huwa rabbu alshshiAAra

translations.name: Wahiduddin Khan
translations.text: that He is the Lord of Sirius.

translations.name: Abdullah Yusuf Ali
translations.text: That He is the Lord of Sirius (the Mighty Star);

translations.name: Hussain Ansarian
translations.text: و اوست که قوم عاد نخستین را هلاک کرد،

translations.name: AbdolMohammad Ayati
translations.text: و اوست كه عاد، آن قوم پيشين را هلاك كرد،

translations.name: Abolfazl Bahrampour
translations.text: و هم اوست كه عاديان نخستين را هلاك كرد

translations.name: Mohammad Mahdi Fooladvand
translations.text: و هم اوست كه عاديان قديم را هلاك كرد.

translations.name: Mahdi Elahi Ghomshei
translations.text: و هم اوست که نخستین قوم عاد را هلاک ساخت.

translations.name: Mostafa Khorramdel
translations.text: و این که او است که عاد نخستین را نابود کرده است. [[«عَادًا الأُولی»: عاد نخستین، قوم معروف که پیغمبرشان حضرت هود بوده است (نگا: احقاف / 21). عاد دوم، در مکه می‌زیسته‌اند و از نسل عاد نخستین بوده‌اند (نگا: المصحف المیسر).]]

translations.name: Baha'oddin Khorramshahi
translations.text: و اوست که عاد نخستین را نابود کرد

translations.name: Naser Makarem Shirazi
translations.text: (و آیا به انسان نرسیده است که در کتب انبیای پیشین آمده) که خداوند قوم «عاد نخستین» را هلاک کرد؟!

translations.name: Mohammad Kazem Moezzi
translations.text: و آنکه او نابود ساخت عاد نخستین را

translations.name: Sayyed Jalaloddin Mojtabavi
translations.text: و اوست كه عاد نخستين- قوم هود- را هلاك كرد

translations.name: Mohammad Sadeqi Tehrani
translations.text: و هم اوست که عادیان نخستین را هلاک کرد.

translations.name: Ahmed Ali
translations.text: That it was He who destroyed the 'Ad of old,

translations.name: Ahmed Raza Khan
translations.text: And that it is He Who earlier destroyed the tribe of Aad?

translations.name: A. J. Arberry
translations.text: and that He destroyed Ad, the ancient,

translations.name: Abdul Majid Daryabadi
translations.text: And that He destroyed the former 'A-ad.

translations.name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
translations.text: And that it is He (Allah) Who destroyed the former 'Ad (people),

translations.name: Talal Itani
translations.text: And that it is He who destroyed the first Aad.

translations.name: Abul Ala Maududi
translations.text: that He it is Who destroyed the ancient 'Ad,

translations.name: Safi-ur-Rahman al-Mubarakpuri
translations.text: And that it is He Who destroyed the former `Ad,

translations.name: Mohammed Marmaduke William Pickthall
translations.text: And that He destroyed the former (tribe of) A'ad,

translations.name: Ali Quli Qarai
translations.text: that it is He who destroyed the former ‘Ad,

translations.name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
translations.text: that it was He that destroyed ancient Aad

translations.name: Saheeh International
translations.text: And that He destroyed the first [people of] 'Aad

translations.name: Muhammad Sarwar
translations.text: It is He who utterly destroyed the ancient tribes of Ad,

translations.name: Mohammad Habib Shakir
translations.text: And that He did destroy the Ad of old

translations.name: English Transliteration
translations.text: Waannahu ahlaka AA<u>a</u>dan alool<u>a</u>

translations.name: Wahiduddin Khan
translations.text: It was He who totally destroyed the former 'Ad

translations.name: Abdullah Yusuf Ali
translations.text: And that it is He Who destroyed the (powerful) ancient 'Ad (people),

translations.name: Hussain Ansarian
translations.text: و [نیز] قوم ثمود را به طوری که [کسی از آنان را] باقی نگذاشت

translations.name: AbdolMohammad Ayati
translations.text: و از ثمود هيچ باقى نگذاشت.

translations.name: Abolfazl Bahrampour
translations.text: و ثموديان را باقى نگذاشت

translations.name: Mohammad Mahdi Fooladvand
translations.text: و ثمود را [نيز هلاك كرد] و [كسى را] باقى نگذاشت.

translations.name: Mahdi Elahi Ghomshei
translations.text: و قوم ثمود را، و هیچ باقی نگذاشت.

translations.name: Mostafa Khorramdel
translations.text: و قوم ثمود را هلاک کرد و از ایشان هیچ باقی نگذاشت. [[«مَآ أَبْقی»: کسی از ایشان را باقی نگذاشت.]]

translations.name: Baha'oddin Khorramshahi
translations.text: و ثمود را نیز، باقی نگذاشت‌

translations.name: Naser Makarem Shirazi
translations.text: و همچنین قوم «ثمود» را، و کسی از آنان را باقی نگذارد!

translations.name: Mohammad Kazem Moezzi
translations.text: و ثمود را بجای نگذارد

translations.name: Sayyed Jalaloddin Mojtabavi
translations.text: و ثمود- قوم صالح- را كه [از كافران‌] هيچ كس را باز نگذاشت

translations.name: Mohammad Sadeqi Tehrani
translations.text: و ثمودیان را (نیز هلاک کرد،) پس (کسی از آنان را) باقی نگذاشت.

translations.name: Ahmed Ali
translations.text: And Thamud, and did not leave them,

translations.name: Ahmed Raza Khan
translations.text: And destroyed the tribe of Thamud, not sparing anyone?

translations.name: A. J. Arberry
translations.text: and Thamood, and He did not spare them,

translations.name: Abdul Majid Daryabadi
translations.text: And that Thamud! He left not.

translations.name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
translations.text: And Thamud (people). He spared none of them.

translations.name: Talal Itani
translations.text: And Thamood, sparing no one.

translations.name: Abul Ala Maududi
translations.text: and Thamud, leaving no trace of them,

translations.name: Safi-ur-Rahman al-Mubarakpuri
translations.text: And Thamud. He spared none of them.

translations.name: Mohammed Marmaduke William Pickthall
translations.text: And (the tribe of) Thamud He spared not;

translations.name: Ali Quli Qarai
translations.text: and Thamud, sparing none [of them];

translations.name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
translations.text: and Thamood, sparing no one,

translations.name: Saheeh International
translations.text: And Thamud - and He did not spare [them] -

translations.name: Muhammad Sarwar
translations.text: Thamud,

translations.name: Mohammad Habib Shakir
translations.text: And Samood, so He spared not

translations.name: English Transliteration
translations.text: Wathamooda fam<u>a</u> abq<u>a</u>

translations.name: Wahiduddin Khan
translations.text: and Thamud tribes,

translations.name: Abdullah Yusuf Ali
translations.text: And the Thamud nor gave them a lease of perpetual life.

verses.text: وَ قَوْمَ‌ نُوحٍ‌ مِنْ‌ قَبْلُ‌ إِنَّهُمْ‌ کَانُوا هُمْ‌ أَظْلَمَ‌ وَ أَطْغَى‌

translations.name: Hussain Ansarian
translations.text: وقوم نوح را پیش تر [هلاک کرد]؛ زیرا آنان ستمکارتر و سرکش تر بودند

translations.name: AbdolMohammad Ayati
translations.text: و پيش از آنها قوم نوح را، كه ستمكارتر و سركش‌تر بودند،

translations.name: Abolfazl Bahrampour
translations.text: و پيش از آنها قوم نوح را [هلاك نمود] آنها ظالم‌تر و طاغى‌تر بودند

translations.name: Mohammad Mahdi Fooladvand
translations.text: و پيشتر [از همه آنها] قوم نوح را، زيرا كه آنان ستمگرتر و سركش‌تر بودند.

translations.name: Mahdi Elahi Ghomshei
translations.text: و پیش از اینان قوم نوح را که ظالم و سرکش‌تر بودند هلاک گردانید.

translations.name: Mostafa Khorramdel
translations.text: و نیز قوم نوح را قبل از آنان هلاک ساخت. چرا که ایشان از همگان ستمگرتر و سرکش‌تر بودند. [[«أَظْلَمَ»: ستمگرتر. «أَطْغی»: سرکش‌تر و نافرمان‌تر.]]

translations.name: Baha'oddin Khorramshahi
translations.text: و نیز پیش از آن قوم نوح را، که ایشان ستمکارتر و سرکش‌تر بودند

translations.name: Naser Makarem Shirazi
translations.text: و نیز قوم نوح را پیش از آنها، چرا که آنان از همه ظالمتر و طغیانگرتر بودند!

translations.name: Mohammad Kazem Moezzi
translations.text: و قوم نوح را از پیش که ایشان بودند ستمگرتر و سرکش‌تر

translations.name: Sayyed Jalaloddin Mojtabavi
translations.text: و قوم نوح را پيش از آن، كه ستمكارتر و سركش‌تر بودند.

translations.name: Mohammad Sadeqi Tehrani
translations.text: و پیشتر (از همه‌ی آنان) قوم نوح را، (که) بی‌گمان آنان ستمگرترین (ستمگران) و سرکش‌ترین (سرکشان) بودند

translations.name: Ahmed Ali
translations.text: Like the people of Noah before them, who were surely oppressors and rebellious;

translations.name: Ahmed Raza Khan
translations.text: And before them, the people of Nooh? Indeed they were more unjust and more rebellious than these!

translations.name: A. J. Arberry
translations.text: and the people of Noah before -- certainly they did exceeding evil, and were insolent

translations.name: Abdul Majid Daryabadi
translations.text: And also the people of Nuh aforetime. Verily they were even greater wrong-doers and more contumacious.

translations.name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
translations.text: And the people of Nuh (Noah) aforetime, verily, they were more unjust and more rebellious and transgressing [in disobeying Allah and His Messenger Nuh (Noah)].

translations.name: Talal Itani
translations.text: And the people of Noah before that; for they were most unjust and most oppressive.

translations.name: Abul Ala Maududi
translations.text: and that He it is Who destroyed the people of Noah before for they were much given to iniquity and transgression.

translations.name: Safi-ur-Rahman al-Mubarakpuri
translations.text: And the people of Nuh aforetime. Verily, they were more unjust and more rebellious and transgressing.

translations.name: Mohammed Marmaduke William Pickthall
translations.text: And the folk of Noah aforetime, Lo! they were more unjust and more rebellious;

translations.name: Ali Quli Qarai
translations.text: and the people of Noah before that; indeed they were more unjust and rebellious;

translations.name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
translations.text: and before them the nation of Noah, they exceeded in evil and were insolent.

translations.name: Saheeh International
translations.text: And the people of Noah before. Indeed, it was they who were [even] more unjust and oppressing.

translations.name: Muhammad Sarwar
translations.text: and the people of Noah; they were the most unjust and rebellious people.

translations.name: Mohammad Habib Shakir
translations.text: And the people of Nuh before; surely they were most unjust and inordinate;

translations.name: English Transliteration
translations.text: Waqawma noohin min qablu innahum kanoo hum athlama waatgha

translations.name: Wahiduddin Khan
translations.text: and before them the people of Noah who were even more unjust and insolent;

translations.name: Abdullah Yusuf Ali
translations.text: And before them, the people of Noah, for that they were (all) most unjust and most insolent transgressors,

translations.name: Hussain Ansarian
translations.text: و شهرها [ی قوم لوط] را زیر و رو کرد و به زمین کوبید.

translations.name: AbdolMohammad Ayati
translations.text: و نيز مؤتفكه را نابود كرد.

translations.name: Abolfazl Bahrampour
translations.text: و شهرهاى واژگون شده [ى قوم لوط] را در هم فرو ريخت

translations.name: Mohammad Mahdi Fooladvand
translations.text: و شهرها[ى سَدوم و عاموره‌] را فرو افكند.

translations.name: Mahdi Elahi Ghomshei
translations.text: و شهرهای قوم لوط را واژگون ساخت.

translations.name: Mostafa Khorramdel
translations.text: و شهرهای زیر و رو شده‌ی قوم لوط را فرو انداخت. [[«الْمُؤْتَفِکَةَ»: (نگا: توبه / 70). «أَهْوی»: از بالا به پائین انداخت. فرو انداخت.]]

translations.name: Baha'oddin Khorramshahi
translations.text: و سرزمین نگونسار را واژگون کرد

translations.name: Naser Makarem Shirazi
translations.text: و نیز شهرهای زیر و رو شده (قوم لوط) را فرو کوبید،

translations.name: Mohammad Kazem Moezzi
translations.text: و باژگون‌شدگان را فرود آورد

translations.name: Sayyed Jalaloddin Mojtabavi
translations.text: و مؤتفكه- شهرهاى قوم لوط- را واژگون ساخت.

translations.name: Mohammad Sadeqi Tehrani
translations.text: و دروغ‌پردازان را فرو افکند.

translations.name: Ahmed Ali
translations.text: And He overthrew the Cities of the Plain,

translations.name: Ahmed Raza Khan
translations.text: And that it is He Who threw down the upturned townships?

translations.name: A. J. Arberry
translations.text: and the Subverted City He also overthrew,

translations.name: Abdul Majid Daryabadi
translations.text: And the subverted cities He overthrew.

translations.name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
translations.text: And He destroyed the overthrown cities [of Sodom to which Prophet Lout (Lot) was sent].

translations.name: Talal Itani
translations.text: And He toppled the ruined cities.

translations.name: Abul Ala Maududi
translations.text: And He brought perdition upon the subverted cities

translations.name: Safi-ur-Rahman al-Mubarakpuri
translations.text: And He destroyed the overthrown cities.

translations.name: Mohammed Marmaduke William Pickthall
translations.text: And Al-Mu'tafikah He destroyed

translations.name: Ali Quli Qarai
translations.text: and He overthrew the town that was overturned,

translations.name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
translations.text: He plunged the villages

translations.name: Saheeh International
translations.text: And the overturned towns He hurled down

translations.name: Muhammad Sarwar
translations.text: It is He who turned upside down the people of Lot

translations.name: Mohammad Habib Shakir
translations.text: And the overthrown cities did He overthrow,

translations.name: English Transliteration
translations.text: Waalmutafikata ahwa

translations.name: Wahiduddin Khan
translations.text: and He overthrew the subverted cities [of Sodom and Gomorrah]

translations.name: Abdullah Yusuf Ali
translations.text: And He destroyed the Overthrown Cities (of Sodom and Gomorrah).

translations.name: Hussain Ansarian
translations.text: پس [عذاب خدا] آنان را احاطه کرد آن مقدار که احاطه کرد.

translations.name: AbdolMohammad Ayati
translations.text: و فروپوشيد آن قوم را، هر چه بايد فروپوشد.

translations.name: Abolfazl Bahrampour
translations.text: پس آنها را [با عذاب فراگيرى‌] چنان كه بايد فرا پوشانيد

translations.name: Mohammad Mahdi Fooladvand
translations.text: پوشاند بر آن [دو شهر، از باران گوگردى‌] آنچه را پوشاند.

translations.name: Mahdi Elahi Ghomshei
translations.text: تا آنکه بر آنها عذابی بسیار سخت احاطه کرد.

translations.name: Mostafa Khorramdel
translations.text: آن را فرو پوشاند آنچه می‌بایست آن را فرو پوشاند. [[«غَشّی»: فرا گرفت. دربر گرفت. پوشاند. «مَا»: مراد هول و هراس و سنگها و دیگر چیزها است. این واژه می‌تواند فاعل و یا مفعول به باشد.]]

translations.name: Baha'oddin Khorramshahi
translations.text: و آن را چنانکه باید، پوشیده داشت‌

translations.name: Naser Makarem Shirazi
translations.text: سپس آنها را با عذاب سنگین پوشانید!

translations.name: Mohammad Kazem Moezzi
translations.text: پس پوشانیدش آنچه پوشانید

translations.name: Sayyed Jalaloddin Mojtabavi
translations.text: پس آنها را فرو پوشانيد آنچه فرو پوشانيد- سنگهايى كه بر آنها بارانيد-.

translations.name: Mohammad Sadeqi Tehrani
translations.text: پس پوشاند بر آنان (از باران گوگردی) آنچه پوشاند.

translations.name: Ahmed Ali
translations.text: So that they were covered over by what they were covered over.

translations.name: Ahmed Raza Khan
translations.text: So they were covered with whatever covered them?

translations.name: A. J. Arberry
translations.text: so that there covered it that which covered.

translations.name: Abdul Majid Daryabadi
translations.text: Then covered them with that which covered them.

translations.name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
translations.text: So there covered them that which did cover (i.e. torment with stones).

translations.name: Talal Itani
translations.text: And covered them with whatever covered them.

translations.name: Abul Ala Maududi
translations.text: and caused them to be covered with that which He covered them with.

translations.name: Safi-ur-Rahman al-Mubarakpuri
translations.text: So, there covered them that which did cover.

translations.name: Mohammed Marmaduke William Pickthall
translations.text: So that there covered them that which did cover.

translations.name: Ali Quli Qarai
translations.text: covering it with what covered it.

translations.name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
translations.text: so that there came upon them that which came.

translations.name: Saheeh International
translations.text: And covered them by that which He covered.

translations.name: Muhammad Sarwar
translations.text: and covered them with torment.

translations.name: Mohammad Habib Shakir
translations.text: So there covered them that which covered.

translations.name: English Transliteration
translations.text: Faghashsh<u>a</u>h<u>a</u> m<u>a</u> ghashsh<u>a</u>

translations.name: Wahiduddin Khan
translations.text: and then covered them from sight forever.

translations.name: Abdullah Yusuf Ali
translations.text: So that (ruins unknown) have covered them up.

translations.name: Hussain Ansarian
translations.text: پس [ای انسان!] در کدام یک از نعمت های پروردگارت تردید می کنی [که آیا از سوی خدا هست یا نیست؟!]

translations.name: AbdolMohammad Ayati
translations.text: پس به كدام يك از نعمتهاى پروردگارت شك مى‌كنى؟

translations.name: Abolfazl Bahrampour
translations.text: پس در كدام يك از نعمت‌هاى پروردگارت ترديد مى‌كنى

translations.name: Mohammad Mahdi Fooladvand
translations.text: پس به كدام يك از نعمتهاى پروردگارت ترديد روا مى‌دارى؟

translations.name: Mahdi Elahi Ghomshei
translations.text: پس (ای بشر) به کدام یک از نعمتهای پروردگارت جدل و انکار می‌کنی؟

translations.name: Mostafa Khorramdel
translations.text: پس (ای کافر نعمت) آیا به کدامیک از نعمتهای پروردگارت شک و تردید می‌ورزی؟ [[«آلآءِ»: جمع إِلْی، نعمتها (نگا: اعراف / 69). «تَتَمَاری»: شک و تردید داری. از (مِرْیَة) به معنی شک و گمان (نگا: فصّلت / 54).]]

translations.name: Baha'oddin Khorramshahi
translations.text: پس به کدامیک از نعمتهای پروردگارت شک و شبهه داری؟

translations.name: Naser Makarem Shirazi
translations.text: (بگو:) در کدام یک از نعمتهای پروردگارت تردید داری؟!

translations.name: Mohammad Kazem Moezzi
translations.text: پس به کدام نعمتهای پروردگار خویش می‌ستیزی‌

translations.name: Sayyed Jalaloddin Mojtabavi
translations.text: پس [اى آدمى‌] به كدام يك از نعمتهاى پروردگارت شك مى‌آرى و ستيزه مى‌كنى؟

translations.name: Mohammad Sadeqi Tehrani
translations.text: پس به کدام یک از نعمت‌های پروردگارت تردید داری‌؟

translations.name: Ahmed Ali
translations.text: How many favours of your Lord will you then deny?

translations.name: Ahmed Raza Khan
translations.text: So O listener! Which favour of your Lord will you doubt?

translations.name: A. J. Arberry
translations.text: Then which of thy Lord's bounties disputest thou?

translations.name: Abdul Majid Daryabadi
translations.text: Which then of thy Lord's benefits wilt thou doubt?

translations.name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
translations.text: Then which of the Graces of your Lord (O man!) will you doubt.

translations.name: Talal Itani
translations.text: So which of your Lord's marvels can you deny?

translations.name: Abul Ala Maududi
translations.text: So, which of your Lord's bounties will you doubt?”

translations.name: Safi-ur-Rahman al-Mubarakpuri
translations.text: Then which of the graces of your Lord will you doubt

translations.name: Mohammed Marmaduke William Pickthall
translations.text: Concerning which then, of the bounties of thy Lord, canst thou dispute?

translations.name: Ali Quli Qarai
translations.text: Then which of the bounties of your Lord will you dispute?

translations.name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
translations.text: So which then of your Lord's favors do you dispute?

translations.name: Saheeh International
translations.text: Then which of the favors of your Lord do you doubt?

translations.name: Muhammad Sarwar
translations.text: About which of the bounties of your Lord can they persistently dispute?

translations.name: Mohammad Habib Shakir
translations.text: Which of your Lord's benefits will you then dispute about?

translations.name: English Transliteration
translations.text: Fabiayyi <u>a</u>l<u>a</u>i rabbika tatam<u>a</u>r<u>a</u>

translations.name: Wahiduddin Khan
translations.text: On which then of your Lord's signs do you cast doubt?

translations.name: Abdullah Yusuf Ali
translations.text: Then which of the gifts of thy Lord, (O man,) wilt thou dispute about?

translations.name: Hussain Ansarian
translations.text: این پیامبر [نیز] بیم دهنده ای از [زمره] بیم دهندگان پیشین است.

translations.name: AbdolMohammad Ayati
translations.text: اين بيم‌دهنده‌اى است همانند بيم‌دهندگان پيشين.

translations.name: Abolfazl Bahrampour
translations.text: اين [پيامبر] بيم رسانى از بيم رسانان پيشين است

translations.name: Mohammad Mahdi Fooladvand
translations.text: اين [پيامبر نيز] بيم‌دهنده‌اى از [جمله‌] بيم‌دهندگان نخستين است.

translations.name: Mahdi Elahi Ghomshei
translations.text: این رسول هم مانند رسولان پیشین ترساننده خلق (از قهر خدا) است.

translations.name: Mostafa Khorramdel
translations.text: این (پیغمبر، یکی از پیغمبران خدا، و) از زمره‌ی بیم دهندگان پیشین است. [[«هذا»: این پیغمبر. «نَذِیرٌ»: بیم‌دهنده از عقاب خدا (نگا: فاطر / 24).]]

translations.name: Baha'oddin Khorramshahi
translations.text: این هشداردهنده‌ای از هشداردهندگان نخستین است‌

translations.name: Naser Makarem Shirazi
translations.text: این (پیامبر) بیم‌دهنده‌ای از بیم‌دهندگان پیشین است!

translations.name: Mohammad Kazem Moezzi
translations.text: این است بیم‌دهنده از بیم‌دهندگان پیشین‌

translations.name: Sayyed Jalaloddin Mojtabavi
translations.text: اين بيم‌كننده‌اى است از همان بيم كنندگان پيشين.

translations.name: Mohammad Sadeqi Tehrani
translations.text: این (پیامبر نیز) بیم‌دهنده‌ای از (جمله‌ی) بیم‌‌دهندگان نخستین است.

translations.name: Ahmed Ali
translations.text: He who warns you is one of the warners of old.

translations.name: Ahmed Raza Khan
translations.text: He (Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him) is a Herald of Warning, like the former Heralds of Warning.

translations.name: A. J. Arberry
translations.text: This is a warner, of the warners of old.

translations.name: Abdul Majid Daryabadi
translations.text: This is a warner of the warners of old.

translations.name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
translations.text: This (Muhammad SAW) is a warner (Messenger) of the (series of) warners (Messengers) of old.

translations.name: Talal Itani
translations.text: This is a warning, just like the first warnings.

translations.name: Abul Ala Maududi
translations.text: This is a warning among the warnings of yore.

translations.name: Safi-ur-Rahman al-Mubarakpuri
translations.text: This is a warner from the warners of old.

translations.name: Mohammed Marmaduke William Pickthall
translations.text: This is a warner of the warners of old.

translations.name: Ali Quli Qarai
translations.text: This is a warner, [in the tradition] of the warners of old.

translations.name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
translations.text: This is a warner from the warners of ancient times.

translations.name: Saheeh International
translations.text: This [Prophet] is a warner like the former warners.

translations.name: Muhammad Sarwar
translations.text: This is a (Prophet) like that of the ancient warners (Prophets).

translations.name: Mohammad Habib Shakir
translations.text: This is a warner of the warners of old.

translations.name: English Transliteration
translations.text: Hatha natheerun mina alnnuthuri aloola

translations.name: Wahiduddin Khan
translations.text: This is a warning just like those of former times.

translations.name: Abdullah Yusuf Ali
translations.text: This is a Warner, of the (series of) Warners of old!

translations.name: Hussain Ansarian
translations.text: قیامت نزدیک شد.

translations.name: AbdolMohammad Ayati
translations.text: قيامت فرا رسيد.

translations.name: Abolfazl Bahrampour
translations.text: رستاخيز نزديك است

translations.name: Mohammad Mahdi Fooladvand
translations.text: [وه چه‌] نزديك گشت قيامت.

translations.name: Mahdi Elahi Ghomshei
translations.text: روز قیامت بسیار نزدیک شده است.

translations.name: Mostafa Khorramdel
translations.text: قیامت نزدیک گردیده است. [[«أَزِفَتْ»: نزدیک گردیده است. فرا رسیده است. «الآزِفَةُ»: نزدیک. مراد قیامت است (نگا: غافر / 18).]]

translations.name: Baha'oddin Khorramshahi
translations.text: [قیامت‌] فرارسنده، فرارسید

translations.name: Naser Makarem Shirazi
translations.text: آنچه باید نزدیک شود، نزدیک شده است (و قیامت فرامی‌رسد)،

translations.name: Mohammad Kazem Moezzi
translations.text: نزدیک گشت نزدیک شونده‌

translations.name: Sayyed Jalaloddin Mojtabavi
translations.text: رستاخيز نزديك شد.

translations.name: Mohammad Sadeqi Tehrani
translations.text: نزدیک‌شونده [:رستاخیز] نزدیک شد.

translations.name: Ahmed Ali
translations.text: What is to come is imminent.

translations.name: Ahmed Raza Khan
translations.text: The approaching event has come near.

translations.name: A. J. Arberry
translations.text: The Imminent is imminent;

translations.name: Abdul Majid Daryabadi
translations.text: There hath approached the approaching Hour.

translations.name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
translations.text: The Day of Resurrection draws near,

translations.name: Talal Itani
translations.text: The inevitable is imminent.

translations.name: Abul Ala Maududi
translations.text: The imminent Hour has drawn near,

translations.name: Safi-ur-Rahman al-Mubarakpuri
translations.text: The Azifah draws near.

translations.name: Mohammed Marmaduke William Pickthall
translations.text: The threatened Hour is nigh.

translations.name: Ali Quli Qarai
translations.text: The Imminent [Hour] is near at hand.

translations.name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
translations.text: The Imminent is near at hand;

translations.name: Saheeh International
translations.text: The Approaching Day has approached.

translations.name: Muhammad Sarwar
translations.text: The Day of Judgment is drawing nearer.

translations.name: Mohammad Habib Shakir
translations.text: The near event draws nigh.

translations.name: English Transliteration
translations.text: Azifati alazifatu

translations.name: Wahiduddin Khan
translations.text: The Hour that was to come draws ever nearer.

translations.name: Abdullah Yusuf Ali
translations.text: The (Judgment) ever approaching draws nigh:

verses.text: لَيْسَ‌ لَهَا مِنْ‌ دُونِ‌ اللَّهِ‌ کَاشِفَةٌ

translations.name: Hussain Ansarian
translations.text: کسی جز خدا برطرف کننده [سختی ها و هول و هراسش] نیست.

translations.name: AbdolMohammad Ayati
translations.text: كس جز خداوند آشكارش نكند.

translations.name: Abolfazl Bahrampour
translations.text: كسى جز خداوند برطرف كننده‌ى [عذاب‌] آن نيست

translations.name: Mohammad Mahdi Fooladvand
translations.text: جز خدا كسى آشكاركننده آن نيست.

translations.name: Mahdi Elahi Ghomshei
translations.text: هیچ کس غیر خدا آن روز را آشکار نتواند ساخت.

translations.name: Mostafa Khorramdel
translations.text: جز خدا هیچکس نمی‌تواند آن را ظاهر و پدیدار کند. [[«کَاشِفَةُ»: ظاهر کننده و پدید آورنده (نگا: اعراف / 187). جلوگیری کننده. معنی دیگر آیه: جز خدا هیچکس نمی‌تواند از وقوع آن جلوگیری کند.]]

translations.name: Baha'oddin Khorramshahi
translations.text: جز خداوند، برای آن آشکارکننده‌ای نیست‌

translations.name: Naser Makarem Shirazi
translations.text: و هیچ کس جز خدا نمی‌تواند سختیهای آن را برطرف سازد!

translations.name: Mohammad Kazem Moezzi
translations.text: نیستش جز خدا گشاینده‌

translations.name: Sayyed Jalaloddin Mojtabavi
translations.text: آن را جز خداى، آشكار كننده‌اى نيست.

translations.name: Mohammad Sadeqi Tehrani
translations.text: جز خدا کسی آشکارکننده‌ی آن (از نهان) نیست.

translations.name: Ahmed Ali
translations.text: There is no one to unveil it apart from God.

translations.name: Ahmed Raza Khan
translations.text: None except Allah can avert it.

translations.name: A. J. Arberry
translations.text: apart from God none can disclose it.

translations.name: Abdul Majid Daryabadi
translations.text: None, except Allah, can avert it.

translations.name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
translations.text: None besides Allah can avert it, (or advance it, or delay it).

translations.name: Talal Itani
translations.text: None besides God can unveil it.

translations.name: Abul Ala Maududi
translations.text: and none but Allah can avert it.

translations.name: Safi-ur-Rahman al-Mubarakpuri
translations.text: None besides Allah can avert it.

translations.name: Mohammed Marmaduke William Pickthall
translations.text: None beside Allah can disclose it.

translations.name: Ali Quli Qarai
translations.text: There is none who may unveil it besides Allah.

translations.name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
translations.text: none except Allah can disclose it.

translations.name: Saheeh International
translations.text: Of it, [from those] besides Allah, there is no remover.

translations.name: Muhammad Sarwar
translations.text: No one besides God can rescue a soul from hardship.

translations.name: Mohammad Habib Shakir
translations.text: There shall be none besides Allah to remove it.

translations.name: English Transliteration
translations.text: Laysa laha min dooni Allahi kashifatun

translations.name: Wahiduddin Khan
translations.text: None but God can avert it.

translations.name: Abdullah Yusuf Ali
translations.text: No (soul) but Allah can lay it bare.

translations.name: Hussain Ansarian
translations.text: آیا از این سخن تعجب می کنید؟

translations.name: AbdolMohammad Ayati
translations.text: آيا از اين سخن در شگفت افتاده‌ايد؟

translations.name: Abolfazl Bahrampour
translations.text: پس آيا از اين سخن عجب داريد

translations.name: Mohammad Mahdi Fooladvand
translations.text: آيا از اين سخن عجب داريد؟

translations.name: Mahdi Elahi Ghomshei
translations.text: آیا از این سخن تعجب می‌کنید،

translations.name: Mostafa Khorramdel
translations.text: آیا از این سخن تعجّب می‌کنید و در شگفت می‌افتید؟ [[«هذَا الْحَدِیثِ»: مراد قرآن است (نگا: زمر / 23).]]

translations.name: Baha'oddin Khorramshahi
translations.text: پس آیا از این سخن عجب می‌کنید؟

translations.name: Naser Makarem Shirazi
translations.text: آیا از این سخن تعجّب می‌کنید،

translations.name: Mohammad Kazem Moezzi
translations.text: آیا از این داستان شگفت مانید

translations.name: Sayyed Jalaloddin Mojtabavi
translations.text: آيا از اين سخن شگفتى مى‌نماييد؟

translations.name: Mohammad Sadeqi Tehrani
translations.text: آیا پس از این سخن عجب دارید؟

translations.name: Ahmed Ali
translations.text: Are you astonished at this news,

translations.name: Ahmed Raza Khan
translations.text: So are you surprised at this fact?

translations.name: A. J. Arberry
translations.text: Do you then marvel at this discourse,

translations.name: Abdul Majid Daryabadi
translations.text: At this discourse then marvel ye?

translations.name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
translations.text: Do you then wonder at this recital (the Quran)?

translations.name: Talal Itani
translations.text: Do you marvel at this discourse?

translations.name: Abul Ala Maududi
translations.text: Will you, then, wonder at this?

translations.name: Safi-ur-Rahman al-Mubarakpuri
translations.text: Do you then wonder at this reci- tation

translations.name: Mohammed Marmaduke William Pickthall
translations.text: Marvel ye then at this statement,

translations.name: Ali Quli Qarai
translations.text: Will you then wonder at this discourse,

translations.name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
translations.text: Do you marvel then at this discourse (the Koran)?

translations.name: Saheeh International
translations.text: Then at this statement do you wonder?

translations.name: Muhammad Sarwar
translations.text: Does this statement seem strange to them

translations.name: Mohammad Habib Shakir
translations.text: Do you then wonder at this announcement?

translations.name: English Transliteration
translations.text: Afamin hatha alhadeethi taAAjaboona

translations.name: Wahiduddin Khan
translations.text: Do you then find these tidings strange?

translations.name: Abdullah Yusuf Ali
translations.text: Do ye then wonder at this recital?

translations.name: Hussain Ansarian
translations.text: و [با چنین وضعی که دارید هنوز] می خندید و نمی گریید؟!

translations.name: AbdolMohammad Ayati
translations.text: و مى‌خنديد و نمى‌گرييد؟

translations.name: Abolfazl Bahrampour
translations.text: و مى‌خنديد و [از خوف قيامت‌] نمى‌گرييد

translations.name: Mohammad Mahdi Fooladvand
translations.text: و مى‌خنديد و نمى‌گرييد؟

translations.name: Mahdi Elahi Ghomshei
translations.text: و (به فسوس و مسخره بر آن) می‌خندید و (به روزگار سخت خود) نمی‌گریید،

translations.name: Mostafa Khorramdel
translations.text: و آیا می‌خندید و گریه نمی‌کنید؟ [[«تَضْحَکُونَ»: می‌خندید. یعنی همچون استهزاء کنندگان می‌خندید. «لا تَبْکُونَ»: گریه نمی‌کنید. یعنی چرا باید همچون متقیان از خوف خدا گریه نکنید.]]

translations.name: Baha'oddin Khorramshahi
translations.text: و می‌خندید و نمی‌گریید؟

translations.name: Naser Makarem Shirazi
translations.text: و می‌خندید و نمی‌گریید،

translations.name: Mohammad Kazem Moezzi
translations.text: و خندید و نگریید

translations.name: Sayyed Jalaloddin Mojtabavi
translations.text: و مى‌خنديد و نمى‌گرييد؟

translations.name: Mohammad Sadeqi Tehrani
translations.text: و می‌خندید و نمی‌گریید؟

translations.name: Ahmed Ali
translations.text: And keep laughing and do not weep,

translations.name: Ahmed Raza Khan
translations.text: And you laugh, and do not weep!

translations.name: A. J. Arberry
translations.text: and do you laugh, and do you not weep,

translations.name: Abdul Majid Daryabadi
translations.text: And laugh and not weep?

translations.name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
translations.text: And you laugh at it and weep not,

translations.name: Talal Itani
translations.text: And laugh, and do not weep?

translations.name: Abul Ala Maududi
translations.text: Will you laugh at it rather than weep?

translations.name: Safi-ur-Rahman al-Mubarakpuri
translations.text: And you laugh at it and weep not,

translations.name: Mohammed Marmaduke William Pickthall
translations.text: And laugh and not weep,

translations.name: Ali Quli Qarai
translations.text: and laugh and not weep,

translations.name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
translations.text: Or do you laugh, and do you not weep

translations.name: Saheeh International
translations.text: And you laugh and do not weep

translations.name: Muhammad Sarwar
translations.text: and do they laugh instead of weeping,

translations.name: Mohammad Habib Shakir
translations.text: And will you laugh and not weep?

translations.name: English Transliteration
translations.text: Watadhakoona wala tabkoona

translations.name: Wahiduddin Khan
translations.text: Why do you laugh rather than weep?

translations.name: Abdullah Yusuf Ali
translations.text: And will ye laugh and not weep,-

translations.name: Hussain Ansarian
translations.text: و همواره سرکشی می کنید و غافلانه به خوشی و خوشگذرانی مشغول هستید؟!

translations.name: AbdolMohammad Ayati
translations.text: و شما غافل شده‌ايد.

translations.name: Abolfazl Bahrampour
translations.text: و شما [از آن‌] در غفلت به سر مى‌بريد

translations.name: Mohammad Mahdi Fooladvand
translations.text: و شما در غفلتيد.

translations.name: Mahdi Elahi Ghomshei
translations.text: و شما سخت غافلید (از این خواب غفلت برخیزید و).

translations.name: Mostafa Khorramdel
translations.text: و آیا پیوسته در غفلت و هوسرانی بسر می‌برید؟ [[«سَامِدُونَ»: جمع سامِد، غافل و هوسران. متکبر و سرگردان از غرور.]]

translations.name: Baha'oddin Khorramshahi
translations.text: و شمایید که بازی کنانید

translations.name: Naser Makarem Shirazi
translations.text: و پیوسته در غفلت و هوسرانی به سر می‌برید؟!

translations.name: Mohammad Kazem Moezzi
translations.text: و شمائید ناآگهان‌

translations.name: Sayyed Jalaloddin Mojtabavi
translations.text: و شما [از اين سخن‌] غافل و سرگرم باطليد.

translations.name: Mohammad Sadeqi Tehrani
translations.text: و شما در لهو، متکبر و سر به هوایید.

translations.name: Ahmed Ali
translations.text: Indulging in pleasantries?

translations.name: Ahmed Raza Khan
translations.text: And you are lost in play!

translations.name: A. J. Arberry
translations.text: while you make merry?

translations.name: Abdul Majid Daryabadi
translations.text: And ye are behaving proudly.

translations.name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
translations.text: Wasting your (precious) lifetime in pastime and amusements (singing, etc.).

translations.name: Talal Itani
translations.text: Lost in your frivolity?

translations.name: Abul Ala Maududi
translations.text: Will you occupy yourselves simply in merriment?

translations.name: Safi-ur-Rahman al-Mubarakpuri
translations.text: While you are Samidun.

translations.name: Mohammed Marmaduke William Pickthall
translations.text: While ye amuse yourselves?

translations.name: Ali Quli Qarai
translations.text: while you remain heedless?!

translations.name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
translations.text: while you are thoughtless?

translations.name: Saheeh International
translations.text: While you are proudly sporting?

translations.name: Muhammad Sarwar
translations.text: indulging in carelessly idle games?

translations.name: Mohammad Habib Shakir
translations.text: While you are indulging in varieties.

translations.name: English Transliteration
translations.text: Waantum samidoona

translations.name: Wahiduddin Khan
translations.text: Will you remain proudly heedless?

translations.name: Abdullah Yusuf Ali
translations.text: Wasting your time in vanities?

translations.name: Hussain Ansarian
translations.text: پس [با این وصف که قیامتی سنگین در پی دارید، بیایید] خدا را سجده کنید و بپرستید.

translations.name: AbdolMohammad Ayati
translations.text: پس خدا را سجده كنيد و او را بپرستيد.

translations.name: Abolfazl Bahrampour
translations.text: پس خدا را سجده آريد و پرستش كنيد

translations.name: Mohammad Mahdi Fooladvand
translations.text: پس خدا را سجده كنيد و بپرستيد.

translations.name: Mahdi Elahi Ghomshei
translations.text: بعد از این به سجده و عبادت خدا پردازید.

translations.name: Mostafa Khorramdel
translations.text: اکنون که چنین است خدا را سجده کنید و او را بپرستید. [[«فَاسْجُدُوا ...»: مراد این است که اگر می‌خواهید در صراط مستقیم حق، گام بردارید، تنها برای او که تمام خطوط عالم هستی به ذات پاک وی منتهی می‌گردد، سجده کنید، و اگر می‌خواهید به سرنوشت دردناک اقوام پیشین گرفتار نیائید که بر اثر شرک و کفر و ظلم و ستم در چنگال عذاب الهی گرفتار شدند، تنها او را عبادت کنید.]]

translations.name: Baha'oddin Khorramshahi
translations.text: پس برای خداوند سجده برید و پرستش کنید

translations.name: Naser Makarem Shirazi
translations.text: حال که چنین است همه برای خدا سجده کنید و او را بپرستید!

translations.name: Mohammad Kazem Moezzi
translations.text: پس سجده کنید برای خدا و ستایش کنید

translations.name: Sayyed Jalaloddin Mojtabavi
translations.text: پس خداى را سجده كنيد و [او را] بپرستيد.

translations.name: Mohammad Sadeqi Tehrani
translations.text: پس برای خدا سجده کنید و هم‌او را بپرستید.

translations.name: Ahmed Ali
translations.text: Bow instead in adoration before God and worship Him.

translations.name: Ahmed Raza Khan
translations.text: Therefore prostrate for Allah, and worship Him. (Command of Prostration # 12)

translations.name: A. J. Arberry
translations.text: So bow yourselves before God, and serve Him!

translations.name: Abdul Majid Daryabadi
translations.text: So prostrate yourselves before Allah and worship.

translations.name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
translations.text: So fall you down in prostration to Allah, and worship Him (Alone).

translations.name: Talal Itani
translations.text: So bow down to God, and worship!

translations.name: Abul Ala Maududi
translations.text: Prostrate yourselves before Allah, and serve Him.

translations.name: Safi-ur-Rahman al-Mubarakpuri
translations.text: So fall you down in prostration to Allah and worship Him.

translations.name: Mohammed Marmaduke William Pickthall
translations.text: Rather prostrate yourselves before Allah and serve Him.

translations.name: Ali Quli Qarai
translations.text: So prostrate yourselves to Allah and worship Him!

translations.name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
translations.text: Rather, prostrate to Allah and worship Him.

translations.name: Saheeh International
translations.text: So prostrate to Allah and worship [Him].

translations.name: Muhammad Sarwar
translations.text: So prostrate yourselves before God and worship him.

translations.name: Mohammad Habib Shakir
translations.text: So make obeisance to Allah and serve (Him).

translations.name: English Transliteration
translations.text: Faosjudoo lillahi waoAAbudoo

translations.name: Wahiduddin Khan
translations.text: Prostrate yourselves before God, and worship Him alone!

translations.name: Abdullah Yusuf Ali
translations.text: But fall ye down in prostration to Allah, and adore (Him)!
